column1: #text=I thought it would nice if I had a cherry tree in my backyard .
#text=There was plenty of room in my yard for a large tree , so I decided to plant one .
#text=I drove my pickup truck to a nursery near where I live .
#text=They had many different types of trees there , all growing in large pots .
#text=The trees were very skinny , but I knew once they were out of the pots and planted in the ground , they would grow into large trees .
#text=I found some cherry trees and saw how much they would cost .
#text=I asked a man who worked at the nursery if he would put the tree in my pickup after I paid for it .
#text=I went to the cashier and paid for the tree and the man loaded it into my truck .
#text=When I got home , I got a shovel and dug a huge hole where I wanted the tree to grow .
#text=I made sure all the big rocks and roots from other trees were not left in the hole .
#text=I added some manure so the roots would get all the extra nutrients a growing tree would need .
#text=In the middle of the hole I made the soil higher in the shape of an upside down cone .
#text=I took the tree out of my truck and removed it from the pot .
#text=I stood the tree up in the middle of the hole , with the tree on the top of the cone and the roots spread out around it .
#text=This would make sure the tree would not be standing in water and the roots could drink the water easily .
#text=I replaced the dirt , making sure the tree was even with the ground around the hole .
#text=When the hole was all filled up I stomped all around the tree to make sure the roots of the tree were firmly connected with the soil .
#text=When I was sure the tree was firmly in the ground and would not move , I got my garden hose .
#text=I turned on the water and slowly watered the tree .
#text=After a few hours , I watered it again .
#text=When all the water had sunk into the ground , I put a few inches of mulch all around the tree to keep the roots moist and stop weeds from growing .
#text=I knew that I would have to water the the tree every week until the roots got established .
#text=The tree will get bigger every year , and I 'm looking forward to the day when I 'll be able to pick cherries in my own back yard !
